scripts.dev: concurrently -n NEXT,ELEC -c blue,magenta "pnpm -C next-app dev" "wait-on tcp:3000 && pnpm -C electron dev"
scripts.build: pnpm -C next-app build && pnpm -C electron build
scripts.start: concurrently -n NEXT,ELEC -c blue,magenta "pnpm -C next-app start" "wait-on tcp:3000 && pnpm -C electron start"
